scripts.init: npm ci && cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../action-server && npm ci
scripts.dev:train: docker compose build rasa && docker compose up
scripts.dev:mac: concurrently --names "frontend,action-server,rasa" -c "auto" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd action-server && npm run dev" "cd rasa && rasa run --enable-api --cors "*""
